meanings.definition: A playing card with a spade as the suit symbol.
meanings.sent1: During the game, I drew the spadilles and won the round.
meanings.sent2: He always keeps the spadilles at the top of his deck.
meanings.sent3: The spadilles seemed to wink at me as I placed it on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as dark and sharp as the spadilles in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The spadilles stood out among the other cards with its bold spade symbol.

meanings.definition: A winning hand in the game of gleek consisting of the ace, king, queen, and knave of trumps.
meanings.sent1: His lucky streak continued as he revealed the spadilles in his hand.
meanings.sent2: The spadilles secured his victory in the gleek tournament.
meanings.sent3: The spadilles danced in his hand as he celebrated his win.
meanings.sent4: The spadilles were like a royal family, dominating the game.
meanings.sent5: The spadilles gleamed triumphantly as he laid them down on the table.
